casebody.data:
No. 10-403. Kathleen R. Wright, fka Kathleen R. Sanger, Petitioner v. Joy Brown, Personal Representative of the Estate of Edwin E. Sanger, Deceased. 562 U.S. 1063, 131 S. Ct. 654,

178 L. Ed. 2d 481,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9433. November 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Michigan denied.
